doc:
Frank Richards (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Richards_(actor) 0 Frank Richards (September 15, 1909– April 15, 1992) was an American actor. He was a character actor, typically playing a hoodlum or thug with a menacing appearance. He appeared in 150 films and televisions shows from 1940 into the mid 1980s. He appeared in a 1952 episode of Superman "The Night of Terror" and a 1953 episode of The Lone Ranger. His first stage appearance was in 1938 and his last film was John Cassavetes' A Woman Under the Influence in 1974. Frank_Richards ( September_15_,_1909 – April_15_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor . He was a_character_actor , typically playing a_hoodlum_or_thug with a_menacing_appearance . He appeared in 150_films and televisions shows from 1940 into the_mid_1980s . He appeared in a_1952_episode of Superman " The_Night of Terror " and a_1953_episode of The_Lone_Ranger . His_first_stage_appearance was in 1938 and his_last_film was John_Cassavetes '_A_Woman Under the_Influence in 1974 .
